snippet: Leaders of a national movement of young immigrants voted to  mobilize in support of a bill to legalize 11 million illegal immigrants in the United States.
abstract: Leaders of United We Dream network, largest organization of youths in America illegally, vote at three-day congress in Kansas City, MO, to mobilize in support of bill that would legalize 11 million illegal immigrants; move will increase pressure on Pres Obama and lawmakers to pass comprehensive immigration overhaul.
lead_paragraph: Leaders of a national movement of young immigrants voted to  mobilize in support of a bill to legalize 11 million illegal immigrants in the United States.

headline.seo: Young Leaders Cast a Wider Net for Immigration Reform
headline.main: Young Immigrant Activists Cast a Wider Net
headline.print_headline: Immigrant Activists Cast a Wider Net

keywords.value: Dream Act (Development, Relief and Education for Minors Act)
keywords.name: subject
